level.heading: Reimbursement of supplemental pension fund by the city.
level.text: ยง 13-668 Reimbursement of supplemental pension fund by the city. The comptroller shall include with his or her budget estimate for each fiscal year amounts estimated by him or her to be sufficient to reimburse the supplemental pension fund for the cost of providing supplemental retirement allowance payments during the current fiscal year to all police retired employees.
